data.he: Once upon a time, in a far-off galaxy, there was a little monkey named Max. Max was a curious monkey, always eager to explore and learn new things. One day, while out on a walk, Max stumbled upon a strange object. It was a small, shining bead, and it seemed to call out to him.
data.she: Once upon a time, in a far-off galaxy, there was a little monkey named Poppy. Poppy was a curious monkey, always eager to explore and learn new things. One day, while out on a walk, Poppy stumbled upon a strange object. It was a small, shining bead, and it seemed to call out to her.

data.he: Max picked up the bead and examined it closely. It was made of a material he had never seen before, and it seemed to glow with a magical energy. Intrigued, Max decided to keep the bead and set out to discover more about it.
